targets.expr: sum by (node) (sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (namespace, pod) group_left() (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1)) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable_cpu_cores{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) * 100

sum by (node) (sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (namespace, pod) group_left() (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1)) / sum by (node) (kube_node_status_allocatable_memory_bytes{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) * 100

sum by (created_by_name) (sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id!="/", container=""}[1m])) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_right() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name)))

sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id!="/", container=""}[1m])) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_left() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name))

sum by (created_by_name) (sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{id!="/", container=""}) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_right() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name)))

sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{id!="/", container=""}) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_left() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name))

sum by (created_by_name) (sum (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{id!="/"}[1m])) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_right() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name)))

sum (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{id!="/"}[1m])) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_left() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name))

sum by (node) (sum(kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (namespace, pod, node) * on (namespace, pod) group_left() (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (pod, namespace) == 1))

sum by (created_by_name) (sum (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending",kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_right() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name)))

sum by (created_by_name) (sum (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_right() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name)))

sum by (created_by_name) (sum (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending",kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_right() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name)))

sum by (created_by_name) (sum (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_right() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name)))

sum by (created_by_name) (sum (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded",kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (namespace, pod) * on (namespace, pod) group_right() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace, created_by_name)))

sum by (phase) (sum (kube_pod_status_phase{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring"}) by (namespace, pod, phase) * on (namespace, pod) group_left() (group (kube_pod_info{kubernetes_namespace="volcano-monitoring",created_by_kind="Job"}) by (pod, namespace)))
